gid.description: The Globally Unique Identifier of the custom field.

resource_type.description: The type of the resource to which this custom field belongs.

gid.description: The Globally Unique Identifier of the user who created this custom field.

resource_type.description: The type of the resource which created this custom field.

name.description: The name of the user who created this custom field.

currency_code.description: The currency code associated with this custom field.

custom_label.description: The custom label assigned to this custom field.

custom_label_position.description: The position of the custom label in relation to the custom field value.

description.description: A description of the custom field to provide more context about its purpose.

display_value.description: The displayed value of the custom field.

enabled.description: Indicates if the custom field is enabled or not.

gid.description: The Globally Unique Identifier of the enum option.

resource_type.description: The type of the resource which this enum option belongs to.

color.description: The color associated with the enum option.

enabled.description: Indicates if the enum option is enabled or not.

name.description: The name of the enum option.

gid.description: The Globally Unique Identifier of the selected enum value.

resource_type.description: The type of the resource which this selected enum value belongs to.

color.description: The color associated with the selected enum value.

enabled.description: Indicates if the enum value is enabled or not.

name.description: The name of the selected enum value.

format.description: The format of the custom field value.

has_notifications_enabled.description: Indicates if notifications are enabled for this custom field.

is_global_to_workspace.description: Indicates if the custom field is global to the entire workspace.

number_value.description: The numerical value associated with the custom field.

precision.description: The precision of the custom field value.

resource_subtype.description: The subtype of the resource type.

text_value.description: The text value associated with the custom field.

type.description: The type of custom field, e.g., text, number, enum, etc.
